speaker.whotheyare: Alexandra Auer designs interactive experiences in physical environments.
speaker.whylisten:
Alexandra Auer's interdisciplinary works touch on current societal trends, promoting an alternative point of view with the aim to trigger a critical reflection of the addressed topic. Throughout her professional career, she has contributed to design offices in the field of scenography and installation design across Europe.

Auer studied Industrial Design at the Eindhoven University of Technology in the Netherlands and is currently pursuing her Master at the Academy of Art and Design in Basel, Switzerland.
